name: reelforge
description: Web-based tool for creating Instagram Reels and TikTok videos from trend-based templates

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd src/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../video && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "backend,frontend,video" --prefix-colors "blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:video"
